dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to enter our territory, insignificant creature.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to cause trouble, just passing by.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your presence alone disrupts our peace. What do you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm, I'll leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good, for that would be wise. Do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek information about the surrounding area.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Information is power. What will you offer in exchange?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge your authority in this place.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! A challenger? Bold words for a mere wanderer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm ready to prove my strength in combat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it, prepare to face the consequences of your arrogance!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize, I spoke out of turn. I will leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't save you now. Face your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking a possible alliance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance with such a feeble being? What do you offer in return?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my assistance in protecting your territory.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Protection from one like you is hardly needed. Leave now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer valuable resources and knowledge from beyond.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resources can be acquired elsewhere. I have no need for you.
